title: What is the net worth of Samsung in 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: It’s not possible to say since while certain business units of Samsung does sell stock, Samsung is really an arm of the South Korea govt (nothing wrong with that) but you are not buying actual ownership of Samsung as is the case with most Wester stock market companies transparent reflection of a companies market cap on a daily basis. Again, nothing wrong with that - just be aware of what you are participating in certain stock markets … more like a bet on a commodity you are not taking deliver of … like buying a barrel of oil future, no one is going to deliver you one barrel of crude …
